security: There is no classified or sensitive information in this document. It is a standard legal form for a mortgage note.
summary: This is a mortgage note for $167,429.88, dated March 2, 1978, between a husband and wife residing in New York and Croush-Walker Company of Atlanta, Georgia, secured by property at 163 East 71st Street, New York, NY.
summary_one_paragraph: This document is a mortgage note dated March 2, 1978, indicating that a husband and wife residing in New York promise to pay Croush-Walker Company of Atlanta, Georgia, $167,429.88 on demand. The note is secured by a mortgage on property located at 163 East 71st Street in Manhattan, New York, and includes standard legal clauses regarding default, waivers, and the integration of the mortgage terms. The document also contains acknowledgment sections for both individual and corporate entities, depending on who is executing the instrument.
title: Mortgage Note
